overview: Living Landscapes Earthscapes programs transform your screen into a window on the world's most inspiring places of natural beauty. Experience the majesty of the Gand Tetons, glittering mountain lakes & the alpine meadows of the snow-capped Sawtooth Mountains. Undulating fields of wildflowers are home to elk, deer, moose & bison in Yellowstone Park. An instant cure for nature deficit disorder.
title: Living Landscapes: The Rocky Mountains
